answers.answer: Hello,sorry for getting back to you so late.  Your symptoms could be diabetes related or they could be something else.  But if it is diabetes, then it is already serious to have such symptoms.  I think it is very important that you go to see your Dr asap and get looked at properly.Please get back to us and let us know how you are going.

question: I was recently told i"m pre-diabetic. I'm a 54-year old overweight woman. I also recently developed additional symptoms: severe edema in feet/ankles/calves (sudden onset three weeks ago), constant (and loud!) ear ringing, blurry vision, dizziness, wheezing (high-pitched, whistling sounds) and headache. The edema becomes so bad it's hard to walk. Could this be related to the pre-diabetes?
title: Additional Symptoms
